title: Composer Magoo
creator_credit: Grants Simmons, Peter De Met, Henry G. Saperstein, Glan Heisch and UPA Pictures
brief_description: Mr Magoo attempts to lodge the new song he has just written with the US Copyright Office. He ends up at a talent tryout by mistake where an Elvis look-alike becomes consumed by jealousy after hearing Magoo’s song.
creator_credit_for_label: Grants Simmons, Peter De Met, Henry G. Saperstein, Glan Heisch and UPA Pictures
